overview: Few new wave groups were as popular as Culture Club. During the early '80s, the group racked up  seven straight Top Ten hits in the U.K. and six Top Ten singles in the U.S. with their light, infectious popsoul. Boy George and Culture Club are now on a US tour, after the recent release of their latest single  “How to Be a Chandelier”. Having delivered over tens of thousands of concerts all over the world, Boy  George and Culture Club will be performing for the first time ever LIVE to cinema audiences all over  the world in February 2023.
title: (LIVE) BOY GEORGE AND CULTURE CLUB
